segments.text: Yeah , the people in the next room are a little loud . Could you do something about it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Of course . What room are you in , sir ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: And do you know which room the noise is coming from ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't know the number , but it's definitely the room that's next to the stairs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Thank you . We'll take care of it . Please let us know if there's anything else we can do to make your stay more comfortable .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , thanks . I really appreciate it .
segments.speaker: S2
